biotools.summary: It is a program that takes SNP population haplotypes and case/control phenotypes to identify disease associated sites. It takes the approach of inferring genealogical history (in the form of ancestral recombination graph or ARG) and then using the ARGs to map the trait.

bioschemas.name: TMARG
bioschemas.summary: It is a program that takes SNP population haplotypes and case/control phenotypes to identify disease associated sites. It takes the approach of inferring genealogical history (in the form of ancestral recombination graph or ARG) and then using the ARGs to map the trait.
